DataElement.preferredName: Person Primary Study Randomized Clinical Trial Participation Ind
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no response to determine whether or not the participant registering is randomized in the Primary Study (RCT).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Primary Study Randomization Clinical Trial Participation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being._Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value._A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it._The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment._A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes._The act of taking part in an activity.

Property.preferredName: Primary Study Randomization Clinical Trial Participation
Property.preferredDefinition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.:A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.:The act of taking part in an activity.

Concepts.definition: Occurring first in time or sequence; original; of greatest rank or importance or value.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
The allocation of individuals to groups by chance, especially in order to control the variables in an experiment.
A research study that prospectively assigns human participants or groups of humans to one or more health-related interventions to evaluate the effects on health outcomes.
The act of taking part in an activity.

DataElementConcept.origin: ECOG CRF:Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

RepresentationTerm.changeDescription: 10.3.20 TL changed WFS from RETIRED PHASED OUT to RETIRED ARCHIVED. Changed Workflow Status DBW 04-27-2016
